name: AzureSentinel
description: Azure Sentinel is a cloud-native security information and event manager (SIEM) platform that uses built-in AI to help analyze large volumes of data across an enterprise.
author: Cortex XSOAR

integration.name: Azure Sentinel (Beta)
integration.description: Use the Azure Sentinel integration to get and manage incidents and get related entity information for incidents.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-get-incident-by-id
commands.description: Gets a single incident from Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-list-incidents
commands.description: Gets a list of incidents from Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-update-incident
commands.description: Updates a single incident in Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-delete-incident
commands.description: Deletes a single incident in Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-list-incident-comments
commands.description: Gets the comments of an incident from Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-incident-add-comment
commands.description: Adds a comment to an incident in Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-list-incident-relations
commands.description: Gets a list of an incident's related entities from Azure Sentinel.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-get-entity-by-id
commands.description: Gets a single entity from Azure Sentinel. Use the azure-sentinel-list-incident-relations command, and get an entity ID to apply this command on. In the current Azure Sentinel API version the retention period for GetEntityByID is 30 days.

commands.name: azure-sentinel-list-entity-relations
commands.description: Gets a list of an entity's relations from Azure Sentinel.

1.0.2.releaseNotes:
#### Integrations
##### Azure Sentinel (Beta)
- Maintenance and stability enhancements.
- Updated the integration docker image to the latest version.
